column4: Hi i have been asking for help for a long time, sorry to sound rude. can someone just confirm with me that sopcast is working? i jus reinstalled ubuntu so i am not sure if its me or my ISP or the sopcast server

Hi i have been asking for help for a long time, sorry to sound rude. can someone just confirm with me that sopcast is working? i jus reinstalled ubuntu so i am not sure if its me or my ISP or the sopcast server
the site is serving.  If no one has responded, my guess is no one online now uses sopcast.
